mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pubmap.raw_pubmap(pmid, article_xml, user_name, megxbar, created, geom, world_region, place) VALUES (#{pmid}, xmlparse(document #{articleXML}), #{userName},to_json(#{megxBarJSON}),#{created}, ST_PointFromText('POINT(${lon} ${lat})',4326),#{worldRegion},#{place})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT true FROM elayers.world_regions WHERE label=#{worldRegion} AND region_type='water')
SELECT label, st_y(ST_Centroid(geom)) as lat, st_x(ST_Centroid(geom)) as lon FROM elayers.world_regions WHERE label=#{oceanName}
